thread.section_title: Americor Financial Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Americor Financial Services | americorfs.com
thread.title: ROB5211
thread.title_full: Americor Financial Services reviewed by ROB5211

author: ROB5211
title: ROB5211
text: From the very first contact I made, Americor's agents have been the most patient, understanding, professional and dedicated personnel I have been in contact with. They thoroughly explained the process and thus far have gotten me the results that I so desperately needed. There very courteous, polite, and knowledgeable agents have walked me through a very difficult process and now I am starting to see results and within a relatively very short time. 6 months and they have already starting settling with lenders, as I just found out from my negotiator Michael George, who's expertise has managed to settle my first debt by approximately half. Thanks so much, to all the personnel that have helped me so far, to include Juan Rosales, Jeremy Cunningham, and few others that fielded my calls when I could not reach the ones named. Thank You!
